review: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my husband, we just got around to getting it set up. We love it! So easy to use... my 4 year old knows how to find his new favorite shows already!
author: MELANIE W

review: Purchased as a 2nd streaming player for our household (Apple TV is the other one).  This streaming player was purchased for a TV that does not have wifi.  We are very pleased with the size of the stick, ease of setup of the Fire stick and more importantly the remote functionality - much easier to use than the Apple TV remote.  Additionally the price was a selling point being this is a 2nd player for us.
author: Gayle

review: So far the Fire TV Stick is amazing! I have not tried Netflix yet but have watched several shows on Prime.  Best device around and worth the wait!  I will be taking this with us on all family vacations in the future.  Set up was incredibly easy and took mere minutes.  If you are considering purchasing the Fire Stick do it now, don't wait!
